data.title: Murazar College
data.text:
In normal sense, the Internal Quality Assurance Cell works to make plans, guides and monitors the quality Assurance and Quality Enhancement activities in any Higher Education Institutions (HEIs). The IQAC shall not be called as record keeping cell only but it shall channelize the efforts to pull up an Institutions in the path of Academic Excellence.

As per the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) guidelines every pre-accredited and post-accredited higher education institutions must have its own Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC). This is very much essential to maintain the Pre & post-accreditation quality of any HEIs. Being the Quality Enhancement is a continuous process hence; the IQAC becomes an essential part for each and every HEIs system and works towards the realization of the goals of quality enhancement and sustenance.

The pre accredited IQAC Committee of Murazar College is constructed on 24-06-2022; vide GB Res. No.05 as per the latest guidelines of NAAC. The Committee is consisted of 17 Office bearers under the Chairmanship of Dr. Sayed Ahammed Ali, Principal, Murazar College. Mr. Nozmul Hoque, Assistant Professor Department of Education is nominated as the 1st IQAC Coordinator of this committee. The IQAC committee is formed with Principal, IQAC Coordinator, Assistant IQAC Coordinator, other Teacher’s representatives, Distinguished Educationist, local managements, student’s representative and a few stakeholders as a member.

The IQAC of Murazar College is taking up several quality assurances steps through curricular and co curricular activities and also trying to create a good environment to maintain files and documents and also developing the institutional database for the entire college.

Murazar College has been provincialised in the Year 2021 and the 1st Cycle of NAAC accreditation is going on. The IQAC team of Murazar College is trying the best to bring up a better result for our College.
